00131 /* <*>printf format functions */
00132 #if !defined (BSTRLIB_NOVSNP)
00133 extern bstring bformat (const char * fmt, ...);
00134 extern int bformata (bstring b, const char * fmt, ...);
00135 extern int bassignformat (bstring b, const char * fmt, ...);
00136 extern int bvcformata (bstring b, int count, const char * fmt, va_list arglist);
00137 
00138 #define bvformata(ret, b, fmt, lastarg) { \
00139 bstring bstrtmp_b = (b); \
00140 const char * bstrtmp_fmt = (fmt); \
00141 int bstrtmp_r = BSTR_ERR, bstrtmp_sz = 16; \
00142         for (;;) { \
00143                 va_list bstrtmp_arglist; \
00144                 va_start (bstrtmp_arglist, lastarg); \
00145                 bstrtmp_r = bvcformata (bstrtmp_b, bstrtmp_sz, bstrtmp_fmt, bstrtmp_arglist); \
00146                 va_end (bstrtmp_arglist); \
00147                 if (bstrtmp_r >= 0) { /* Everything went ok */ \
00148                         bstrtmp_r = BSTR_OK; \
00149                         break; \
00150                 } else if (-bstrtmp_r <= bstrtmp_sz) { /* A real error? */ \
00151                         bstrtmp_r = BSTR_ERR; \
00152                         break; \
00153                 } \
00154                 bstrtmp_sz = -bstrtmp_r; /* Doubled or target size */ \
00155         } \
00156         ret = bstrtmp_r; \
00157 }
00158 
00159 #endif

00189 struct tagbstring {
00190         int mlen;
00191         int slen;
00192         unsigned char * data;
00193 };
00194 
00195 /* Accessor macros */
00196 #define blengthe(b, e)      (((b) == (void *)0 || (b)->slen < 0) ? (int)(e) : ((b)->slen))
00197 #define blength(b)          (blengthe ((b), 0))
00198 #define bdataofse(b, o, e)  (((b) == (void *)0 || (b)->data == (void*)0) ? (char *)(e) : ((char *)(b)->data) + (o))
00199 #define bdataofs(b, o)      (bdataofse ((b), (o), (void *)0))
00200 #define bdatae(b, e)        (bdataofse (b, 0, e))
00201 #define bdata(b)            (bdataofs (b, 0))
00202 #define bchare(b, p, e)     ((((unsigned)(p)) < (unsigned)blength(b)) ? ((b)->data[(p)]) : (e))
00203 #define bchar(b, p)         bchare ((b), (p), '\0')
00204 
00205 /* Static constant string initialization macro */
00206 #define bsStaticMlen(q,m)   {(m), (int) sizeof(q)-1, (unsigned char *) ("" q "")}
00207 #if defined(_MSC_VER)
00208 /* There are many versions of MSVC which emit __LINE__ as a non-constant. */
00209 # define bsStatic(q)        bsStaticMlen(q,-32)
00210 #endif
00211 #ifndef bsStatic
00212 # define bsStatic(q)        bsStaticMlen(q,-__LINE__)
00213 #endif
00214 
00215 /* Static constant block parameter pair */
00216 #define bsStaticBlkParms(q) ((void *)("" q "")), ((int) sizeof(q)-1)
00217 
00218 /* Reference building macros */
00219 #define cstr2tbstr btfromcstr
00220 #define btfromcstr(t,s) {                                            \
00221     (t).data = (unsigned char *) (s);                                \
00222     (t).slen = ((t).data) ? ((int) (strlen) ((char *)(t).data)) : 0; \
00223     (t).mlen = -1;                                                   \
00224 }
00225 #define blk2tbstr(t,s,l) {            \
00226     (t).data = (unsigned char *) (s); \
00227     (t).slen = l;                     \
00228     (t).mlen = -1;                    \
00229 }
00230 #define btfromblk(t,s,l) blk2tbstr(t,s,l)
00231 #define bmid2tbstr(t,b,p,l) {                                                \
00232     const_bstring bstrtmp_s = (b);                                           \
00233     if (bstrtmp_s && bstrtmp_s->data && bstrtmp_s->slen >= 0) {              \
00234         int bstrtmp_left = (p);                                              \
00235         int bstrtmp_len  = (l);                                              \
00236         if (bstrtmp_left < 0) {                                              \
00237             bstrtmp_len += bstrtmp_left;                                     \
00238             bstrtmp_left = 0;                                                \
00239         }                                                                    \
00240         if (bstrtmp_len > bstrtmp_s->slen - bstrtmp_left)                    \
00241             bstrtmp_len = bstrtmp_s->slen - bstrtmp_left;                    \
00242         if (bstrtmp_len <= 0) {                                              \
00243             (t).data = (unsigned char *)"";                                  \
00244             (t).slen = 0;                                                    \
00245         } else {                                                             \
00246             (t).data = bstrtmp_s->data + bstrtmp_left;                       \
00247             (t).slen = bstrtmp_len;                                          \
00248         }                                                                    \
00249     } else {                                                                 \
00250         (t).data = (unsigned char *)"";                                      \
00251         (t).slen = 0;                                                        \
00252     }                                                                        \
00253     (t).mlen = -__LINE__;                                                    \
00254 }
00255 #define btfromblkltrimws(t,s,l) {                                            \
00256     int bstrtmp_idx = 0, bstrtmp_len = (l);                                  \
00257     unsigned char * bstrtmp_s = (s);                                         \
00258     if (bstrtmp_s && bstrtmp_len >= 0) {                                     \
00259         for (; bstrtmp_idx < bstrtmp_len; bstrtmp_idx++) {                   \
00260             if (!isspace (bstrtmp_s[bstrtmp_idx])) break;                    \
00261         }                                                                    \
00262     }                                                                        \
00263     (t).data = bstrtmp_s + bstrtmp_idx;                                      \
00264     (t).slen = bstrtmp_len - bstrtmp_idx;                                    \
00265     (t).mlen = -__LINE__;                                                    \
00266 }
00267 #define btfromblkrtrimws(t,s,l) {                                            \
00268     int bstrtmp_len = (l) - 1;                                               \
00269     unsigned char * bstrtmp_s = (s);                                         \
00270     if (bstrtmp_s && bstrtmp_len >= 0) {                                     \
00271         for (; bstrtmp_len >= 0; bstrtmp_len--) {                            \
00272             if (!isspace (bstrtmp_s[bstrtmp_len])) break;                    \
00273         }                                                                    \
00274     }                                                                        \
00275     (t).data = bstrtmp_s;                                                    \
00276     (t).slen = bstrtmp_len + 1;                                              \
00277     (t).mlen = -__LINE__;                                                    \
00278 }
00279 #define btfromblktrimws(t,s,l) {                                             \
00280     int bstrtmp_idx = 0, bstrtmp_len = (l) - 1;                              \
00281     unsigned char * bstrtmp_s = (s);                                         \
00282     if (bstrtmp_s && bstrtmp_len >= 0) {                                     \
00283         for (; bstrtmp_idx <= bstrtmp_len; bstrtmp_idx++) {                  \
00284             if (!isspace (bstrtmp_s[bstrtmp_idx])) break;                    \
00285         }                                                                    \
00286         for (; bstrtmp_len >= bstrtmp_idx; bstrtmp_len--) {                  \
00287             if (!isspace (bstrtmp_s[bstrtmp_len])) break;                    \
00288         }                                                                    \
00289     }                                                                        \
00290     (t).data = bstrtmp_s + bstrtmp_idx;                                      \
00291     (t).slen = bstrtmp_len + 1 - bstrtmp_idx;                                \
00292     (t).mlen = -__LINE__;                                                    \
00293 }
00294 
00295 /* Write protection macros */
00296 #define bwriteprotect(t)     { if ((t).mlen >=  0) (t).mlen = -1; }
00297 #define bwriteallow(t)       { if ((t).mlen == -1) (t).mlen = (t).slen + ((t).slen == 0); }
00298 #define biswriteprotected(t) ((t).mlen <= 0)
